description: This file implements authentication endpoints for user registration and login using FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and custom security functions. It defines API routes for registering new users and obtaining JWT tokens, including database interactions and response models.

methods.name: register_user(payload: UserCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles user registration, checking for existing email, creating a new user, and saving it to the database.

methods.name: login(payload: UserLogin, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and issues a JWT token upon successful login.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^async def login(payload: UserLogin, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: register_user
ctags.pattern: /^async def register_user(payload: UserCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
